greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Gray code variant of A048896.
comment: Has a different permutation of the same terms in A048896 through the 2^n-th term.
Uses the Gray code weight (gt) in A005811 instead of the binary weight (wt) in A000120.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 26 2013
